pages.text: My znayemo tsilkom shcho yak kazhutʹ, lyudsʹke isnuvannya navchaye yoho!" Yazyk dzherela vony natyakayutʹ na ne-arabsʹki, ta tse ye doskonalyy arabsʹkyy yazyk
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto ne viryatʹ v BOZHYM vidkryttyam, BOH ne keruye nymy. Vony zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
Yedyni khto vyhotovlyayutʹ nevirni doktryny ye tsey khto ne viryatʹ v BOZHYM vidkryttyam; vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnykh brekhuniv

Tsey khto disbelieve u BOHU, pislya nabuvshy viry, ta stavav tsilkom vmistom z disbelief, zaznaly hnivu z BOHA. Yedyni buty vybacheni ye tsey khto prymushuyutʹsya shchob spoviduvaty disbelief, v toy chas, yak yikhni serdenʹka ye povni viry
Tse podane tomu, shcho vony mayutʹ priorytet do tsʹoho zhyttya nad U maybutnʹomu, ta BOH ne keruye takym disbelieving lyudy
Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu komu BOHA opechatalo yikhni serdenʹka, ta yikhnye slukhannya, ta yikhniy zir. Otzhe, vony zalyshayutʹsya unaware
Bez sumnivu, vony budutʹ losers u U maybutnʹomu
Yak dlya tsykh khto pereyizhdzhayutʹ vnaslidok persecution, todi prodovzhuyutʹsya doklasty zusylʹ ta steadfastly persevere, vash Lord, vnaslidok vsʹoho tse, Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
